New recruit Agent Almond,


I’m your handler. You can call me Director Stem. You and I are low on the food chain, but we can make a big difference. 

 As you know, we’ve been in a prolonged conflict with the Redwood Republic, which is hell-bent on making sawdust out of every Oak. We’ve received some intel that there is a defecting Redwood agent, tired of the sap-shed and ready to talk to us. 

 The task is simple: collect some Vine Cred, convert the Redwood rogue agent to our side, then get yourself to the Dead Drop Date Palm. This is your first mission with the Oaken Empire - don’t let us down. 

 S
To start the mission, press play on your headphones. Use that button to interact with sites in the mission.
